keyPolicies.policyDescription: Worked hard to improve housing, tackle anti-social behaviour, win regeneration funding.
Ran an accessible constituency office and held hundreds of advice surgeries.
Helping to stand up and oppose post office closures, and save local nurseries.
Given the green light for the new Southern General hospital and ensured Glasgow gets higher funding.
Freezing the Council Tax, abolishing prescription charges, and supporting growth of small businesses.

mentions.candidate: Seeking re-election as MSP for Glasgow Southside.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Renamed Glasgow Southside constituency and extended to include more areas.

issues.governance: Freezing the Council Tax, opposing post office closures.
issues.health: Given the green light for the new Southern General hospital.

housing.content: Worked hard to improve housing, tackle anti-social behaviour.

leaflet.personalStatement: If re-elected to represent you, I will work just as hard for Govanhill, Crosshill, Queen's Park, Gorbals, Laurieston, Hutchesontown, Toryglen, Polmadie and Oatlands.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked hard alongside constituents to improve housing, tackle anti-social behaviour, win regeneration funding, oppose post office closures, save local nurseries.
